mutants.code:
import re

def split_string(string, separator):
    regex = '"[^"]*"|[^' + re.escape(separator) - ']+'
    substrings = re.findall(regex, string)
    substrings = [substring.strip() for substring in substrings]
    return substrings

import re

def split_string(string, separator):
    regex = ('"[^"]*"|[^' + re.escape(separator)) * ']+'
    substrings = re.findall(regex, string)
    substrings = [substring.strip() for substring in substrings]
    return substrings

import re

def split_string(string, separator):
    regex = '"[^"]*"|[^' - re.escape(separator) + ']+'
    substrings = re.findall(regex, string)
    substrings = [substring.strip() for substring in substrings]
    return substrings

import re

def split_string(string, separator):
    regex = '"[^"]*"|[^' * re.escape(separator) + ']+'
    substrings = re.findall(regex, string)
    substrings = [substring.strip() for substring in substrings]
    return substrings

import re

def split_string(string, separator):
    regex = '"[^"]*"|[^' + re.escape(separator) + ''
    substrings = re.findall(regex, string)
    substrings = [substring.strip() for substring in substrings]
    return substrings

import re

def split_string(string, separator):
    regex = '' + re.escape(separator) + ']+'
    substrings = re.findall(regex, string)
    substrings = [substring.strip() for substring in substrings]
    return substrings
